fields.name: ExcludedNamespaces
fields.description: List of namespaces excluded from guardrails checks

fields.name: Level
fields.description: The guardrails level to be used. By default, Guardrails is enabled for all namespaces except those that AKS excludes via systemExcludedNamespaces

fields.name: SystemExcludedNamespaces
fields.description: List of namespaces specified by AKS to be excluded from Guardrails

fields.name: Version
fields.description: The version of constraints to use
